sel.command.util



interface CommandSender: sel.lang.Messageable;
Interface for command senders.

abstract EntityPosition position();
Gets the command sender's current position.

abstract Entity[] visibleEntities();
Gets the list of the entities visible by the command sender.

abstract Player[] visiblePlayers();
Gets the list of the players visible by the command sender.

interface WorldCommandSender: sel.command.util.CommandSender;
Interface for a command sender that is spawned in a world.

abstract pure nothrow @nogc @property @safe World world();
Gets the command sender's world.

template SingleEnum(string value)
Created an enum with a single value that can be used in commands with a single argument.

Example:
// test add @a
@command("test") test0(SingleEnum!"add", Target target) {}

// test remove @a
@command("test") test1(SingleEnum!"remove", Target target) {}


template SnakeCaseEnum(T) if (is(T == enum))
Example:
enum Example : int {
   plain = 12,
   camelCase = 44,
   PascalCase = 100,
   ALL_UPPERCASE = 200
}
alias Snake = SnakeCaseEnum!Example;
assert(Example.plain == Snake.plain);
assert(Example.camelCase == Snake.camel_case);
assert(Example.PascalCase == Snake.pascal_case);
assert(Example.ALL_UPPERCASE == Snake.all_uppercase);


struct PositionImpl(V) if (isVector!V);
alias Position = PositionImpl!(Vector!(double, "xyz")).PositionImpl;
Indicates a position with abslutes and/or relatives coordinates.

Example:
auto pos = Position(Position.Point.fromString("~"), Position.Point.fromString("1"), Position.Point.fromString("~10"));
auto res = pos.from(BlockPosition(1, 10, 100));
assert(res == BlockPosition(1, 1, 110));


@property V from(V position);
Creates a vector from an initial position (used for relative values).

struct Target;
Indicates a target selected using a username or a target selector. For reference see Command on Minecraft Wiki.

static Target fromString(CommandSender sender, string str);
Creates a target from a username or a selector string.
